trans-unit.source: Defines a pixel format for images and pixel-based surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Define um formato de pixel para imagens e analisa baseado em pixels.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *pixelFormat* One of the predefined pixel formats defined by the class.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *pixelFormat* um dos formatos de pixel predefinidas definidos pela classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bits-per-pixel (bpp) for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bits por pixel (bpp) para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of bits-per-pixel (bpp) for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de bits por-pixel (bpp) para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual para o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The Object to compare with the current Object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para a comparação com o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: if the is equal to obj; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the is equal to obj; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the pixel format equals the given <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o formato de pixel é igual a determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The pixel format to compare.
trans-unit.target: O formato de pixel a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the pixel formats are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os formatos de pixel são iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> instances are considered equal.
